OOC: obsidean is at the igl so you meant strika and you can borrow tankor
::Tankor/jetstorm/thrust/strika::
the four hurry and arive at the command room
---wingedwarrior41@... wrote:
> Daemos arrived to the command room of the Shadow Destiny. Belthassan, 
> his old friend, was standing there.
> 
> Daemos:
> Bel! How good to see you again!
> 
> He took Belthassan's hand and shook it vigourously, while the other 
> smiled back.
> 
> Belthassan:
> And you too! It has been a long time since we served the Matrix and 
> the Tripredacus together!
> 
> Daemos:
> Yes, much too long! I have heard, though, that you wish to grant the 
> power of the Matrix to your... our new troops...
> 
> Belthassan:
> Yes, and they have agreed to be reformatted. Do you wish to assist me?
> 
> Daemos:
> Of course! I would never miss a chance to serve the Matrix, as well as 
> our mission!
> 
> Belthassan:
> Good! Gesper, bring some emergency energon trees, we will need them.
> 
> Gesper:
> Sir, yes Sir!
> 
> Daemos:
> All right... Tankor, Obsidean, Thrust and Jetstrom, report to the 
> command room at once... Reformation is at hand!!
> 
> (LOD, I'll need to borrow one of your char in order to fully describe 
> the reformatting process)
> 
> 


=====
cybers will rule
